description: A comprehensive security-focused baseline for Microsoft Outlook on Windows platforms. Implements security best practices including blocking external content, enforcing safe image handling, and configuring secure email processing.

settings.name: DisableExternalImages
settings.description: Block external content in HTML emails to prevent tracking and malicious content

settings.name: BlockUnsafeHTML
settings.description: Block HTTP images in HTML emails to enforce HTTPS-only content

settings.name: CachedMode
settings.description: Enable Exchange cached mode for improved performance and offline access

settings.name: SyncWindowDays
settings.description: Limit email sync to 90 days to balance storage and compliance requirements
